ResistanceFeature.Name: Armor of Resistance
ResistanceFeature.Text: You have resistance to psychic damage while you wear this armor.

MagicProperty.Name: Armor of Resistance (psychic)
MagicProperty.Description: You have resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly from the options below.
MagicProperty.Base: Armor and (Light or Medium or Heavy)
